column1: A shit so bad that it gives you cramps after.
A shit so bad that it makes you dizzy.
A shit so bad that it makes you late for work.
A shit so bad that it makes you promise yourself you will eat more vegetables.
A shit so bad that it's easier to take a shower than it is to wipe.
A shit so bad that the smell reminds you of the open latrines from summer camp.
A shit so bad that you brace for the splash back.
A shit so bad that you break a sweat.
A shit so bad that you can smell the spicy food you ate yesterday.
A shit so bad that you clog the toilet on a courtesy flush.
A shit so bad that you give yourself a courtesy flush.
A shit so bad that you have to change direction you wipe.
A shit so bad that you have to go back and wipe again 10 minutes after.
A shit so bad that you have to shave your ass to get rid of the smell
A shit so bad that you spray air freshener before you go.
A shit so bad that you think you have given birth.
A shit so bad that you thought you were peeing.
A shit so bad that you throw your cloths out the bathroom in hopes of the smell not latching on to them.
A shit so bad that you use a baby wipe instead of toilet paper.
A shit so bad that your glad it comes out.
A shit so bad that your leg falls asleep before you are done.
A shit so bad that your roommate complains about the smell an hour later.
A shit that you thought it was a fart.
Actually bothering to check if there is TP before you sit down.
Scat singing wile scatting on the john. (A new term for Scatman John. I am sorry, R.I.P.)
The kind of shit where you have to pull off the freeway to use a public bathroom in a restaurant.
The next shift after you found soap bubbles in the bottom of your coffee cup.
